main event: A UFO sighting observed from two aircraft on November 20, 1962, in Arizona.
interesting points: The object was reported to have a fiery glow and a vapor trail., The sighting lasted only a glimpse as the object descended at high speed., Observations from three areas indicated the object performed maneuvers., The object disappeared behind a mountain after its descent., The initial conclusions ranged from it being a balloon to a possible meteor.
witness description: two air visual observers and one ground observer
